metadata.name: Operation Access | Foundation Block
metadata.description:
Powering the future of the Creator Economy. 
 An experiment exploring how to broaden the application and execution of Web 3 for creators while simultaneously expanding the definition of what it means to be a “Web 3” Studio. 
 
 Each Foundation Block can be redeemed for the following: 
 
 - WEB 3 POWERED WEBSITE 

 -ZERO FRICTION™ EXPERIENCE 

 - SMART CONTRACT 

 - ONBOARDING EXPERIENCE 

 -TOTAL OWNERSHIP 

 -MODULAR DESIGN 

 More information on Exhale Studios, Operation Access and the Foundation block can be found at https://www.operationaccess.xyz
